ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Worldly Issues & "Play Nice"
ygData.msgSnippet: Usually if we get xp for the normal mobs, we can t take the named.  This was a huge surprise the first time Soarin showed up and made mincemeat of our group in
ygData.messageBody:
Usually if we get xp for the normal mobs, we can't take the named. This was
a huge surprise the first time Soarin showed up and made mincemeat of our
group in short order. We were already only getting xp for Quetzals and
Tanagers. None of the casters could affect Soarin at all so a general
fleeing occurred. Needless to say both bards were the first to die. I
outran Soarin only to come over a rise and be stunned by a Quetzal. The
other bard died before the 'RUN' command could even be issued.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Friday, March 17, 2000 3:34 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Worldly Issues & "Play Nice"


From: <kim@...>

On Fri, 17 Mar 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> The spawns that kill me the most are the 20 minute spawns where the named
> spawns as a rare spawn. We have wasted weeks trying to get those. Only a
> few hours true, but that's weeks for us unfortunately.

My philosophy with those has been to hit them when you're the
right level to get experience for fighting in the area. Then
you'll be having a good time, and if the named mob shows up,
he's just icing on the cake.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
